name: Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza
address: Carrer Des Botafoc, 2, 07850 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza has a garden, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Cala Llenya. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, karaoke and a kids' club. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms are equipped with a kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. At Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a gluten-free breakfast. Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis and tennis at this 4-star hotel, and car hire is available. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Cala Llenya Beach, Cala Mastella Beach and Cala Nova Beach. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 29 km from Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza.

name: Hacienda Na Xamena, Ibiza
address: Urbanizacion na Xamena Buzon 11, 07815 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Offering amazing sea views from its clifftop position and from its stylish rooms, this impressive hotel is located in Na Xamena, on Ibiza’s north coast. It offers a spa, a gym, tennis court and 3 swimming pools. Hotel Hacienda Na Xamena’s spa has indoor and outdoor areas, including the Suspended Waterfalls Thalassotherapy Circuit which offers fantastic views. There is a massage area located in a bamboo hut which faces the sunset in the west. The Na Xamena has 2 restaurants, including a poolside bar that serves snacks and drinks for informal all-day dining, and a very chic Mediterranean-inspired space with terraces on various levels overlooking the sea. The bright, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Hacienda Na Xamena feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom. All have a private hot tub and many have a mini-pool looking out over the Mediterranean Sea. There is a 24-hour reception and staff can provide information about what Ibiza has to offer, and they can help to arrange transport, car rental and reservations at restaurants or nightclubs. You can drive to Ibiza Town in 30 minutes from Hotel Hacienda Na Xamena, and Sant Antoni de Portmany is 35 minutes away. Es Canar, with its famous hippy market, is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hard Rock Hotel Ibiza
address: Carretera Playa D'en Bossa 10, 07817 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Hard Rock Hotel Ibiza is located right on the beachfront in Playa d'en Bossa. This modern hotel has a large open-air stage hosting prestigious weekly concerts. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. This large hotel has 2 outdoor pools and a spa with a hot tub and sauna, as well as a gym. There is also an exclusive private beach club with beach bar next to the hotel, and a range of chill-out areas. Hard Rock Ibiza is decorated with a range of music memorabilia. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. The windows also have blackout curtains. There are 6 on-site restaurants and various bars. The hotel also offers a venue for teenagers, and there is an entertainment programme for children. Ibiza Airport is just 7 minutes' drive from Hard Rock Hotel Ibiza.

name: Can Lluc Hotel Rural
address: Cami Des Terset, Ctra Sant Rafel a Santa Agnes Km 2, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Featuring an outdoor pool, a wellness area, and a restaurant serving a free buffet breakfast, Can Lluc Boutique Country Hotel & Villas is set in a valley in the heart of Ibiza. Each air-conditioned room includes a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar, kettle and Nespresso coffee machine. Bathrooms come with a hairdryer, bathrobe, slippers and welcome toiletries. Each room is decorated differently. Some have a private terrace, while other have a fireplace or a hot tub. Can Lluc Restaurant is specializes in Mediterranean and local cuisine. The restaurant offers a small range of dishes made with fresh produce grown at the property. The wellness room features a Finish sauna, a hot tub and a fitness area. Massages and beauty treatments can be arranged at the hotel. Ibiza town and San Antonio are both around 10 minutes' drive away. The hotel is well connected to the main highways and roads.

name: ME Ibiza
address: Urbanización S'Argamassa, 153, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Situated right in front of the beach and offering multiple swimming pools, a spa with contemporary beauty treatments, and beautiful ocean views, ME Ibiza hotel is located in S'Argamassa. Free Wi-Fi is available. This stylish and elegant hotel offers a variety of room types, including ground floor suites with direct pool access, sun loungers, private gardens and other exclusive benefits. Some suites have wonderful views of the sea. A free bottle of water is provided in all rooms. All rooms provide Smart TV with Chromecast. The Rooftop offers dazzling views, an infinity-style pool and Balinese beds, available only for adults. The ground floor presents an upbeat environment with daily DJs, Balinese beds and a poolside menu. Thai Room Spa Wellness offers Thai treatments. RADIO Rooftop bar offers Mediterranean cuisine and cocktails, with sea views while at Bianco Mare Restaurant guests can enjoy authentic Italian cuisine from organic ingredients and Origens Restaurant combines characterful Ibizan bohemian style with imaginative interpretations of classic Mediterranean dishes. Fresh ingredients and local specialities for lunch and dinner. The property offers a fitness area and free private parking. Complimentary yoga sessions are offered daily, on request and subject to availability. There is a Kids' Club. Nikki Beach Ibiza is located beside the hotel. Es Cana tourist resort is just 1.5 km away, and Ibiza town is 12 km from the property. Ibiza Airport is a 35-minute drive from the hotel. You can also hire a private boat to the beautiful neighbouring island of Formentera, on request and subject to availability. The hotel offers free valet parking.

name: Bless Hotel Ibiza, a member of The Leading Hotels of the World
address: Cala Nova - Es Canar, 07849 Es Canar, Ibiza Island
description: Overlooking the Mediterranean Sea and the island of Tagomago, Bless Hotel Ibiza is located in a quiet part of eastern Ibiza. It features an outdoor infinity pool and direct beach access. All air-conditioned rooms come with a private furnished terrace or balcony, satellite TV and an iPod docking station. There is also a fan, safe and desk. The private bathroom has a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel has a bar and restaurant and 24-hour reception. The Micheline star restaurant Etxeko at the accommodation is run by the 12 Michelin-starred chef Martin Berasategui, and serve special menu. Other facilities available at the property are a gym, spa and meeting rooms. In the nearby resort of Es Canar is one of the island’s most famous hippy markets. The town of Santa Eulalia is only 5 km away.

name: Boutique Hostal La Curandera de Salinas
address: Carretera Sa Canal de Ses Salines, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Boutique Hostal La Curandera de Salinas features a garden, a shared lounge and a sun terrace with swimming pool and continental breakfast in Ibiza Town. Among the various facilities are a bar, water sports facilities, as well as a tennis court. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a concierge service. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Spanish and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Boutique Hostal La Curandera de Salinas offers a children's playground. Activities such as hiking, windsurfing, diving can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Las Salinas Beach is 400 metres from the accommodation, while Es Cavallet Beach is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 5 km from Boutique Hostal La Curandera de Salinas.

name: Nobu Hotel Ibiza Bay
address: Cami Ses Feixes 52, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Seafront on Ibiza’s Talamanca Beach, Nobu Hotel Ibiza Bay offers spa access, two pools, a kid’s club and rooftop terrace suites. Ibiza Town is 3 km away. Each room is decorated with luxurious details and equipped with free WiFi. All offer marble bathrooms with rainfall showers, floor to ceiling windows and open terraces with sea or garden views. The suites are spacious and come with a plush lounge area and separate dressing room. Some include a kitchenette and private plunge pool. The resort has four restaurants and bars, offering a variety of options for all tastes. Bay Café serves gluten-free dishes and the Nobu restaurant serves Japanese-Nikkei fusion cuisine. There is also a beachfront chiringuito-style restaurant, which serves fresh sea food. Ibiza Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hostal Cala Boix
address: Cala Boix Bajos 22, 07850 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Offering charming rooms with Mediterranean Sea views, Hostal Cala Boix has a peaceful setting 50 metres from Cala Boix’s beaches. It offers a restaurant and a terrace offering views of the surrounding countryside. Guests can use recreational areas located 400 metres from the property and set among lovely, green gardens, overlooking the sea. Each bright, spacious room at Hostal Cala Boix has light, attractive décor with wooden finishes. Some overlook Cala Boix and the property’s gardens and feature a balcony. All have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. You can enjoy traditional Ibizan cuisine in the Boix’s restaurant, which specialises in fish dishes and also offers vegetarian options. San Carlos is just 10 minutes’ drive from the guest house, while Santa Eulària des Riu is 12 km away. You can reach Ibiza Town in 40 minutes by car.

name: Can Gat
address: Carretera San Carlos, 07840 Sant Carles de Peralta, Ibiza Island
description: Casa Rural Can Gat features a swimming pool and outdoor tennis courts, as well as rooms with direct pool access. It also provides highchairs, a children's play area and luggage storage. There are a variety of facilities available to guests of the property, such as a safe, laundry facilities and a table tennis table. Pets are also welcome. Rooms at Casa Rural Can Gat include a power shower, a coffee maker and a complimentary fruit bowl. They are air conditioned and offer a private balcony, a mini bar and an iPod docking station. The property is under a 35-minute drive from Ibiza Airport. Ibiza Town and Es Canar are located a short drive away.Revato

name: Aparthotel Pabisa Orlando
address: Canyes 15, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This apartment complex is located in Playa de Palma and 12 km from Palma and 4km from the airport of Palma de Mallorca. Renovated in 2009, has 73 apartments. Facilities available to guests at this establishment include a lobby area with 24-hour reception, bar and restaurant, playground, hotel safe, currency exchange and a lift. Free Internet access in public areas and a laundry service (surcharge). The resort also has a tour desk.FarePortal

name: Sheraton Mallorca Arabella Golf Hotel
address: Carrer de la Vinagrella, 07013 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The first golf resort on the island, Sheraton Mallorca Arabella Golf Hotel, continues to be a favored destination for sports enthusiasts and families. Blending Palma’s easy living with sporting heritage and generational appeal, the 93 rooms and suites are designed to suit modern lives. A first-choice location for golfers, Golf Son Vida’s 18th hole is placed within putting distance from the hotel. Bordered by two additional 18-hole pro-standard options, Golf Son Muntaner and Golf Son Quint including a pitch and putt, Sheraton Mallorca is unhindered by boundaries, with fairways and hotel grounds seamlessly merging to create an evergreen environment. Championing a family-friendly dynamic, the hotel’s extensive choice of activities, ranges from playing tennis and volleyball to catering for those willing to explore the island by bike. The brand new Arabella Kids & Tweens Club awaits to welcome our young guests, with fun games and exciting activities. Stay fit while travelling at our new Sheraton Fitness.Marriott

name: Hotel Joan Miró Museum
address: Carrer de Bartomeu Fons, 8, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Opposite the Marivent Palace and set on Palma’s seafront, Hotel Joan Miró Museum has an outdoor pool and is just 200 metres from the Fundación Pilar i Joan Miró. Each air-conditioned room includes free WiFi and a balcony. This charming hotel will feature original pieces of work from Joan Miró. All rooms come with air-conditioning, satellite TV and a safe. The Hotel Joan Miró Museum's restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean cuisine for dinner. There is a modern lounge bar. Hotel Joan Miró Museum has 2 large event areas where guests can hold a variety of events. The accommodation also offers a garage for bicycles. The nearest golf course is 10 minutes’ drive away and guests can receive discounts on courses around the island. Porto Pí Shopping Centre is just 3 minutes’ drive away. The centre of Palma de Mallorca is 7 minutes away by car.

name: Hilton Mallorca Galatzo
address: Carretera Palma-Andratx, Km 20, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Hilton Mallorca Galatzo is a tourist destination that prioritizes the well-being of its guests from arrival to departure. A restorative retreat where you can enjoy the Mediterranean climate and lifestyle during your stay on the island, whether it is a leisure or business trip. In the heart of nature, 20 minutes from Palma de Mallorca and 10 minutes from the marinas of Andratx and Puerto Portals, its 54,000 square meters of gardens promise guests relaxation and direct contact with the sea thanks to memorable views and the nearby beach of Paguera.Hilton

name: Lago Garden Apart-Suites & Spa Hotel
address: Buen Paseo s/n, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Our stylishly decorated hotel is a quiet and welcoming haven, where you will find a perfect balance between sophistication and comfort. Lago Garden is a real oasis in Cala Ratjada, as it is surrounded by pleasant gardens which make a perfect setting for the tasteful reception area and terraces. Our hospitable staff are there to ensure all guests are pampered and well looked after.

name: JS Sol de Alcudia
address: Avinguda Venecia, 3, 07408 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Located 450 metres from the beach in the picturesque Mallorcan resort of Port d’Alcudia, the JS Sol de Alcudia Hotel offers fantastic views over Lago Menor Lake and the mountains. Surrounded by shops and nightlife, the hotel has a large outdoor pool and children’s pool. Free sun loungers and parasols are available. The wooden terrace has a hot tub, sauna and pressure shower. JS Sol de Alcudia’s buffet restaurant offers regional and international cuisine. It features show cooking and a weekly themed dinner. There is also a poolside terrace bar with live music each night. The hotel has a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk. Guests will be able to store bicycles at the lock-up garage, subject to availability, and use the repair shop with cleaning area for free. Free parking is available nearby and Aucanada Golf Club is 3 km away. Seasonal hotel: open from April to October.

name: Hotel Club Cala Marsal
address: Playa Cala Marsal, s/n, 07670 Portocolom, Mallorca
description: Set just 200 metres from Mallorca's sunny white beaches, this hotel offers a variety of facilities for all the family, including an outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi, and excellent buffet dining. Admire the sea view from your private balcony at the Hotel Club Cala Marsal. Rooms are spacious and air-conditioned, with fully-equipped en suite bathrooms. Take a dip in the Club Cala Marsal's outdoor pool - there is also a pool for children - or head down to the sandy beaches to sunbathe. Explore the fine Mallorcan scenery on a rental bike, work out at the gym, or enjoy a game of tennis, table tennis or snooker back at the hotel. You can sip sangria at the pool bar, or sample Spanish beer at one of the 2 indoor bars. Make the most of a full entertainment programme from Monday to Saturday to keep your kids entertained. There is also a games room and playground.

name: Melia Cala d'Or Boutique Hotel
address: Carrer Portinatx, 16-18, Cala d'Or, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Meliá Cala d'Or offers luxurious rooms with free WiFi throughout the hotel. Located in Cala d'Or, this property is just minutes from the center of Cala d'Or, Cala Gran and Cala Ferrera, You can have a meal at Restaurant Es Llaüt, Sa Pastera, or Salon Wistaria. There is an outdoor pool with a whirlpool and a children's pool surrounded by gardens. This elegant hotel has a central sun terrace and gardens. Rooms feature elegant Mediterranean design and include air condition and free WiFi. In addition, the junior suites have a kitchen and lounge. Es Llaüt is open for breakfast and evening for dinner with local and international cuisine. In Sa Pastera Bar, located poolside, you can enjoy all day drinks and snacks at noon. In addition, during the summer months, it is open at night so they can enjoy a wonderful dinner in a quiet and perfect environment. At the spa, you can enjoy the heated pool, spa bath, sauna, steam bath and bithermal shower and gym. We also have massages and beauty treatments. Room rates include free access to the spa and gym.

name: Hotel Bon Sol Resort & Spa
address: Paseo De Illetas, 30, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: This enchanting, family-run hotel overlooks the Bay of Palma, nestling amongst pine trees and tropical gardens. Descend through these gardens to the rock-lined pools and the secluded beach below. At the top of the Bon Sol you will find a Moorish tower offering amazing views across this picturesque bay in southern Majorca. From here, you can head down through the lush gardens, passing by the sun terraces, scenic swimming pools, spa facilities and down to the small, sandy beach on the Mediterranean Sea. Other great facilities include tennis courts and a winter conservatory. Inside, the Arabian-influenced decor, antique-style furniture and precious artwork combine to give the feel of a Medieval castle. This unique atmosphere is made more welcoming by the informal, family atmosphere.

name: Js Alcudi-Mar
address: Avenida S'Albufera, 49 (Alcudia), 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Set less than 100 metres from Playa de Muro Beach, Js Alcudi-Mar features air-conditioned rooms with balconies. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, a spa and free WiFi. For an extra charge, the hotel has a cycling centre with a garage and equipment shop. There is also cycling equipment in the gym, and the spa provides relaxation. The Alcudi-Mar’s spa has Turkish baths, a hot tub and sauna. Treatments on offer include massage and hydrotherapy. Guests can enjoy a range of international cuisine in the Js’ buffet restaurant. There is also a café-bar, which opens onto the poolside terrace. All air-conditioned accommodation at the Js Alcudi-Mar has simple décor with parquet floors. Each room comes with satellite TV and a minibar. The hotel is less than 1 km from the centre of Playa de Muro and 12 km from S’Albufera Park. Alcúdia and its port are less than 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: The St. Regis Mardavall Mallorca Resort
address: Carretera Palma-Andratx 19, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: A refined tastemaker located on the southwest coast of Mallorca, The St. Regis Mardavall Mallorca is a luxurious family resort offering an exceptional retreat. Arranged across four terracotta-hued buildings, the 125 guestrooms and suites all have large private terraces with an alluring Mediterranean vista. An arbiter of the island’s most distinctive flavors, connoisseurs from near and far converge to dine at our exceptional Michelin-starred Es Fum Restaurant, while the St. Regis Bar with its modern design sets new heights as a lobby art bar on the island. Our new contemporary designed Terra Restaurant brings a fresh air to the hotels classic look with its “Farm to Table” concept, celebrating the island’s rich culinary heritage and local produce. Mar Sea Club will make for a luxurious shore side atmosphere, a go-to destination for those seeking the ultimate in relaxation and indulgence with captivating sea views or by our newly renovated cascade swimming pool.Marriott

name: Hotel & Spa S'Entrador Playa
address: Carrer de l'Agulla, 123, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Hotel & Spa S’Entrador Playa is set near Cala Agulla Beach, in Majorca’s Cala Ratjada. It is surrounded by pine forests, and has impressive views of the coast and hills. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, a sun terrace and gardens. There is a play area for children. There are also tennis courts and a fitness centre. Rooms at the S’Entrador Playa are bright and comfortable. They all have a balcony and satellite TV. The hotel spa has a sauna, hammam and Turkish bath. There is an indoor pool with hot tub. Massages and other treatments are also available. The hotel has a restaurant and a bar. There is also a 24-hour reception, with a tour desk and currency exchange.

name: Aparthotel Ciudad Laurel
address: Av.Beat Ramon Llull, 53, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Set in Cala Millor, 800 metres from Cala Bona Beach, Aparthotel Ciudad Laurel offers accommodation with free WiFi, a terrace or a balcony and access to a garden and a seasonal outdoor pool. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. At Aparthotel Ciudad Laurel you will find a restaurant serving international cuisine. The accommodation offers 3-star accommodation with a fitness room and children's playground. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Aparthotel Ciudad Laurel, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Cala Millor Beach is less than 1 km from the aparthotel, while Natural Park S'Albufera de Mallorca is 39 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 68 km from Aparthotel Ciudad Laurel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa
address: Belgica, 91, Port de Sóller, Mallorca
description: Located on Mallorca’s north-west coast, this modern hotel overlooks the Port de Sóller Bay. It offers an impressive infinity pool, a fitness centre and a spa, all with fantastic views. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms at Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa feature a private balcony, free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV. Each one has a coffee maker and a minibar. Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa has 3 restaurants which serve a wide range of dishes and offer fantastic sea views. Cap Roig offers traditional Mediterranean food and Es Fanals serves a creative selection of Spanish tapas and Sunset Sushi Lounge is popular for its selection of freshly prepared sushi, Asian-style tapas and locally inspired cocktails.There are also 2 pool-side bars. Talise Spa at Jumeirah Port Soller features a hammam suite, a heated hydropool and a thermal area. The town of Valldemossa is a 25-minute drive from the hotel. Central Palma and Palma Airport are each 35 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Exagon Park
address: Ronda de Pleta, 46, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Hotel Exagon Park is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Majorca. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, family room, restaurant, tours are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, heating, wake-up service. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, sauna, outdoor pool, indoor pool, spa. Convenience and comfort makes Hotel Exagon Park the perfect choice for your stay in Majorca.priceline.com

name: Hotel Na Forana
address: Arquitecto Alomar, 5, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Hotel Na Forana is set on Son Moll Beach, between Cala Rajada and Capdepera. It features a gym, hot tub, an indoor pool and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool overlooking the beach. Each bright, air-conditioned room at Hotel Na Forana has elegant décor, a TV, a safe and a minibar. Many rooms offer balconies with sea views. You can enjoy a range of Mediterranean dishes in the Na Forana’s buffet restaurant, which offers show cooking twice a day. There are also spacious lounge areas with free Wi-Fi. Free kayak tours are organised from the Hotel Na Forana reception desk. The centre of Cala Rajada is a 5-minute walk from the hotel, while Capdepera is a 20-minute walk away. There are 2 golf courses within 5 km of the Na Forana.

name: Aparthotel Novo Mar
address: Gavines, 3, 07181 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Aparthotel Novo Mar is 100 metres from Paguera’s Torá Beach, in south-western Mallorca. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool, free WiFi and air-conditioned apartments with a terrace and flat-screen TV. Each bright and modern Novo Mar apartment has tiled floors and a living room with a sofa. The private bathroom comes with amenities, and the well-equipped kitchenette includes a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Most apartments have sea views. (upon request and subject to availability) A buffet breakfast is available at the Novo Mar complex. You can also have dinner in the restaurant on prior request, and show cooking is offered. Special diet menus can be requested and there is also a lounge with a flat-screen TV and a bar. Wi-Fi is offered throughout the complex, and is free in public areas. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk. Santa Ponsa Golf Course is 3 km away and Camp de Mar Golf Course is 3.5 km away.

name: Catalonia Atenas
address: Av. Meridiana, 151, 08026 Barcelona
description: Set 3 metro stops from central Barcelona, the Atenas Catalonia has a rooftop swimming pool, offering views of the nearby Torre Agbar and Sagrada Familia. It also features free WiFi, a gym and a spa with a Turkish bath. The bright rooms of Hotel Atenas Barcelona have simple décor with wooden flooring. Each has air conditioning, a mini fridge with complimentary water, and satellite TV. The hotel's buffet breakfast features a show kitchen. There is a snack bar and guests can enjoy stunning city views from the pool, set on the 11th floor. The Sagrada Familia is just over one kilometre from the hotel, while Glòries shopping centre can be reached in 15 minutes by foot. The Catalonia Atenas has a convenient left luggage service, on-site parking, and is 2 minutes’ walk from Clot Metro Station; and 200 metres from Clot Train Station; here you can take a direct train to Barcelona Airport.

name: Novotel Barcelona City
address: Avinguda Diagonal 201, 08018 Barcelona
description: Upon arrival you will be greeted by our team in a close, friendly way. Enjoy our buffet breakfast and the magic of show-cooking, plus the Mediterranean cuisine served in our restaurant with fresh and seasonal products. Visit the 19th floor and enjoy the spectacular panoramic view of Barcelona, with a cocktail or some tapas. Immerse yourself in our pool under the sun's rays.accorhotels.com

name: Novotel Madrid Campo de Las Naciones
address: Calle De Amsterdam, 3, 28042 Madrid
description: Enjoy the modern facilities at the Novotel Madrid Campo de las Naciones hotel. In a quiet area, the hotel boasts excellent access to Puerta del Sol, 30 minutes away by metro, and the IFEMA exhibition center, a 5-minute walk away. It is home to nine meeting rooms and rooms that boast a contemporary design with every comfort, including complimentary WIFI. After a day playing golf on the adjoining course, relax at the poolside bar or in the restaurant and enjoy the Mediterranean cuisine served at Novotel.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Málaga Nostrum Airport
address: Calle Herman Hesse, No.17, 29004 Málaga, Andalusia
description: NEWLY REFURBISHED HOTEL Hotel Málaga Nostrum is located in a key point of Málaga, just 5 minutes by car from the airport, 10 minutes from the center and 10 minutes from the beach. We offer a unique experience aiding rest and relaxation. Our modern and bright rooms have free Wi-Fi, Smart TV with access to Netflix, air conditioning, desk and minibar. The private bathroom has a hairdryer and toiletries. Discover our breakfasts at Global Restaurant & Lounge, located on the ground floor of the hotel, which also houses our Sport Bar and a large leisure terrace. On the 4th floor you can enjoy the views of the sky of Malaga from our pool, and a splendid Chill Out area. We have a 24-hour reception and covered parking for €5/night for all our clients. Dogs are allowed according to availability with an extra cost of €15/night. Dogs weighing more than 10 kg will not be allowed.

name: Hostal Vidamia
address: C/Cisneros nº7, 29018 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Hostal Vidamia is located in central Málaga, within 7 minutes’ walk of Málaga Cathedral and the Picasso Museum. Set in a restored 19th-century building, it offers elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms at the Vidamia feature white wooden floors and smart, minimalist décor. Each one comes with a private bathroom. Staff can provide information about what the Costa del Sol has to offer. Cervantes Theatre and the Roman amphitheatre are within 10 minutes’ walk. The popular shopping street of Calle Larios is located just 3 minutes’ away. La Malagueta Beach and the bullring are 20 minutes’ walk from the guest house. You can also walk to the train station in around 20 minutes.

name: Gloria Palace Amadores Thalasso & Hotel
address: La Palma, 2, 35139 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Gloria Palace Amadores is set on a cliff top, between Gran Canaria’s Puerto Rico and Amadores Beaches. This luxury spa hotel offers 2 outdoor pools and spectacular Atlantic Ocean views. Gloria Palace, one of the largest thalasotheraphy centres in Europe, offers a seawater pool, massage and various treatments. There is a sauna, Turkish bath and physiotherapy pool. Air-conditioned rooms have a private balcony with sea views. There is satellite TV, and you can hire the safe and minibar. Guests have access to free Wi-Fi in their room and throughout the hotel. Tennis coaching is available on the floodlit tennis court. There is a gym, and you can play table tennis, bowls, archery and darts. Children have their own swimming pool, playground and mini-club. Evening shows are provided for both adults and children. Amadores has a buffet restaurant with show cooking and nightly themed buffets are offered. There are several bars, including a piano bar and pool bar. Gloria Palace has a 24-hour reception and offers car hire. Free parking is offered.

name: Gloria Palace San Agustin Thalasso & Hotel
address: Calle Las Margaritas, Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Set 600 metres from Las Burras Beach in Gran Canaria, the luxurious Gloria Palace San Agustin offers a rooftop pool with sea views. It features a spa and rooms with a balcony, the hotel has been completely renovated in 2021. Rooms at the Gloria Palace Hotel San Agustin have a simple design and include air conditioning. Most of them enjoy sea views. Free WiFi is available. Gloria Palace has outdoor pools for children and adults, surrounded by gardens and sun terraces with loungers. You can also play padel and tennis, or use the gym, for an extra cost. The rooftop pool also carries a surcharge. The property also offers an on-site bicycle shop, where you can buy equipment and rent a bicycle. Free shuttle buses run to Playa del Inglés and Maspalomas beaches. The Maspalomas Golf Course is 5 km away and special discounts apply to guests at the Gloria Palace Hotel Gran Canaria.

name: H10 Playa Meloneras Palace
address: Mar Caspio, 5, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: H10 Playa Meloneras Palace is next to Meloneras Beach and Golf Course in southern Gran Canaria. It has 3 swimming pools, a sun terrace, spa and striking design inspired by Antoni Gaudí. The rooms at the H10 Meloneras feature tiled floors and typical Mediterranean décor. They all come with a private balcony and satellite TV. The hotel’s Tamadaba buffet restaurant offers show cooking and international food. Gaudí Restaurant serves à la carte meals, and there is also a poolside bar-café and 2 other bars. Leisure facilities at the H10 Gran Canaria include tennis courts and a mini club for children. The lively resort of Playa del Inglés is around 10 minutes’ drive from the Hotel Playa Meloneras. Gran Canaria Airport is just 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: H10 Atlantic Sunset
address: Avenida Adeje 300 Playa Paraiso, 38678 Callao Salvaje, Tenerife
description: No description found

name: Abora Interclub Atlantic By Lopesan Hotels
address: Calle Los Jazmines, 2, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: This all-inclusive club is located in the higher part of San Agustín, nestled in a 10 acre park boasting fantastic panoramic views of the Atlantic and the vast Maspalomas sand dunes. The complex boasts 168 double rooms plus 240 family rooms with capacity for up to 4 people. Many have sea views, though those with views over the spacious gardens are not less privileged. In the gardens themselves it is always possible to find a spot to place a sun lounger and relax under the palm trees. All roms are equipped with direct telephone, Satellite TV, Safe, Sofa, Bathroom with bath and WC and Balcony or terrace. Traditional Sports enthusiasts area catered well at the club with multi-functional sports facilities including 4 tennis courts and sport grounds. You are also sure to be tempted by the nearby San Agustín beach or one of the 2 onsite outdoor pools, to cool off with a refreshing dip. The complex also boasts a first-class entertainment team that makes sure the day is full of games, group sports, music and evening shows. During the summer months, children have their own mini club and there is a special programme of activities for young teenagersWebBeds

name: Abora Catarina by Lopesan Hotels
address: Avenida de Tirajana, 1, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Abora Catarina by Lopesan is located in Playa del Inglés, 250 metres from the Maspalomas Sand Dunes. This hotel features a buffet restaurant, bars, 5 outdoor swimming pools, and fitness centre. All rooms have air conditioning, TV, telephone and sofa bed. The Double Family Pool and Double Deluxe Pool rooms have a terrace and private pool. The Double Superior room with hydromassage and terrace and the Double Garden room have a terrace with garden view. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and a shared terrace. Guests can also enjoy the games room and there is a playground for children. Gran Canarias Airport is located a 20-minute drive from Abora Catarina by Lopesan, and the city of Las Palmas is 55 km away.

name: Seaside Sandy Beach
address: Av. Menceyes, 1, Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: This Arabic-style hotel offers free WiFi, tennis courts and an outdoor swimming pool with jets, surrounded by subtropical gardens. Playa del Inglés Beach is just 500 metres away. Seaside Sandy Beach’s spacious, air-conditioned rooms include satellite TV and a furnished balcony. Hairdryers and bathrobes are available on request. Guests can enjoy wonderful ocean views from the outdoor gym. There is also a Hammam, sauna and massages service. A private terrace with a hot tub is also available to hire. Sandy Beach has an air-conditioned buffet restaurant and meals can also be served on the beautiful garden terrace. There is also a poolside snack bar and an on-site bakery. Coffee and cakes are served in the afternoon. The hotel is located in central Playa del Inglés, within a 10-minute walk of popular Yumbo Shopping Centre. Maspalomas Golf Course is only 1.5 km away.

name: Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada Resort & Spa
address: Urbanización Costa Del Papagayo, 35580 Arrecife, Lanzarote
description: Located in Playa Blanca, Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada Resort & Spa offers beachfront accommodation 200 metres from Playa Dorada and provides various facilities, such as a bar, a shared lounge and a garden. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also features with a restaurant, a water park and a year-round outdoor pool. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and room service. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a rain shower. A buffet breakfast is available daily at Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada. The accommodation offers a children playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada Resort & Spa. A car rental service is available at the property. Playa Blanca is less than 1 km from the hotel, while Flamingo Beach is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Lanzarote, 35 km from Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Rural La Raya 1866
address: Calle La Raya 25, 38500 Güimar, Tenerife
description: Situated in Güimar, 47 km from Golf del Sur, Hotel Rural La Raya 1866 features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the property is located within 25 km of Museo militar regional de Canarias. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and room service. At the hotel rooms include air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. Hotel Rural La Raya 1866 offers some rooms with pool views, and rooms are equipped with a coffee machine. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Hotel Rural La Raya 1866 offers a children's playground. Tenerife Espacio de las Artes is 30 km from the hotel, while Leal Theatre is 31 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife North–Ciudad de La Laguna, 35 km from Hotel Rural La Raya 1866, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: H10 Rubicón Palace
address: Urb. Montaña Roja, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: H10 Rubicón Palace is set in white-washed buildings around a lagoon-style pool in the Lanzarote fishing village of Playa Blanca. Overlooking La Mulata Beach, it features a spa and 10 restaurants and bars. Each air-conditioned room at the H10 Rubicon Palace Hotel is spacious and bright. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. Guests can hire beach towels at reception. Two buffet restaurants offer show cooking and themed dinners. À la carte options include The Steakhouse, which offers American specialties; the Dolce Vita features Italian cuisine and Sakura serves fusion-oriental cuisine. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the Piano Bar, Sports Bar, Mike's Coffee, or La Choza pool bar. The Despacio Spa has an indoor pool with hydromassage beds, Turkish baths and a sauna. There is also a gym and treatment booths. For children there are clubs for different ages, with entertainment provided, as well as Daisy Adventure, which offers a pirate ship and water games. There are regular ferries to the neighboring island of Fuerteventura from Playa Blanca Port, 10 minutes’ drive from the Hotel H10 Rubicon Palace.

name: Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa
address: Calle Gran Bretana, Costa Adeje, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa is located in Adeje’s coast, offering spectacular views of the Atlantic Ocean and La Gomera. The luxurious facilities include 12,000 m2 of gardens. Each elegant room has a balcony or terrace with outdoor furniture, flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, and safe. The private bathroom includes a bath or shower and hairdryer. Free WiFi is available throughout. There is an a-la-carte and a buffet restaurant on site, as well as a snack bar and several lounges. The nearest beach is 400 metres from Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa. Siam Park is a 3-minute drive from the property, and Tenerife Sur Airport is 15 minutes away by car. - The establishment offers Preferred Club®, with preferential status and exclusive services such as: - access to the Preferred Club Lounge with a selection of snacks and drinks during the day, - exclusive concierge service, selection of the best rooms including superior attributes, - among other special advantages.

name: Hotel Livvo Risco Del Gato Suites
address: Calle Sicasumbre, 2, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: The elegant Hotel LIVVO Risco del Gato Suites is situated 200 metres from Sotavento Beach in Costa Calma. Set within gardens, it is surrounded by swimming pools on different levels and offers a heated indoor pool. The suites feature air conditioning, a living room with satellite TV, a coffee-maker and a private bathroom with a whirlpool bath. Each has its own inner patio with an outdoor shower. There is also a terrace and small private garden. La Terraza del Gato restaurant offers á la carte Mediterranean cuisine and a breakfast buffet is served in the El Despertar restaurant. Guests can enjoy drinks in the El Mirador lobby-bar. Hotel LIVVO Risco del Gato Suites offers a spa and wellness centre complete with a gym, sauna, Turkish bath and hot tub. There is an indoor heated swimming pool, and massage services are also available. The town centre of Costa de Calma is 2 km away from the hotel with shops, restaurants and bars. Fuerteventura Airport is 66 km away. Please note that for stays of 7 nights or longer, half-board service, guest will have a free bottle of wine.

name: Hl Miraflor Suites
address: Timple, 4, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Miraflor Suites is set in central Playa del Inglés. The complex boasts freshwater swimming pools and a free shuttle to the beach. Each bungalow and studio at the Miraflor Suites comes with a furnished terrace and satellite TV. All have a kitchenette with fridge, microwave and coffee machine. There is also 1 free baby cot. WiFi access is available for an additional charge. Buffet meals, live entertainment and 24-hour reception are offered. The Kasbah Shopping and Leisure Centre is only 600 metres from the Miraflor. The Yumbo Shopping Centre is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife
address: Avenida de Adeje 300, s/n, 38678 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Featuring an on-site night club and a beauty salon, Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife is located in Adeje and boasts 5-star accommodation. Guests also have exclusive access to the Rock Spa® and Superstar Pools. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. Facilities include complimentary wireless internet, an outdoor pool and outdoor tennis courts. The hotel also has its very own gym, Hard Rock Roxity Kids Club ™. Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife offers 624 rooms, all of which are fitted with an iPod docking station, a rain shower and a mini bar. Hot drinks can be brewed with the provided coffee and tea supplies. There is also a private balcony, an in-room safe and a flat-screen TV. Guests of the hotel are invited to sample seafood cuisine at Montauk, or try seafood and Asian meals at Narumi. Dining options at the hotel include Constant Grind Coffee Shop & Bar and Sessions. Other dining options are also available. Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife is within easy reach of Adeje’s popular restaurants, clubs and nightlife. For those with a car, parking is available on site and Costa Adeje is a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Seaside Los Jameos Playa
address: Playa De Los Pocillos, Calle Marte,2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Situated on Los Pocillos Beach, the Canarian-style Los Jameos Playa offers outdoor pools surrounded by palm trees and 4 tennis courts. It features a small Finnish spa with a gym, bio-sauna and Turkish Bath. Each spacious air-conditioned room at Seaside Los Jameos has a balcony and is decorated with soft colours and light wood furniture. They include satellite TV, and minibars and safes can be rented. The main restaurant, with its beautiful covered terrace, offers a varied buffet dinner, with special themes and BBQ nights. The Belingo Bar offers a animated entertainment programme with live music and dancing. Los Jameos Lanzarote offers daily activities for adults and children, including minigolf and beach volleyball. There are also games and activities for children. Several bars, restaurants and shops are within 10 minutes’ walk away. Los Jameos Playa Hotel is just a 10-minute walk from Matagorda, and 2 km from central Puerto del Carmen. Lanzarote Arrecife Airport is just 5 km away. There is a golf course less than 3 km away.

name: Sheraton Fuerteventura Beach, Golf & Spa Resort
address: Avenida De Las Marismas No. 1, 35610 Caleta de Fuste, Fuerteventura
description: Ideally located on the eastern coast of Fuerteventura, one of the Canary Islands that is especially renowned for its idyllic beaches and warm temperature all year round. Sheraton Fuerteventura Beach, Golf & Spa Resort has 266 comfortable rooms and suites designed in elegant Canarian style with private terraces. Our 5-star hotel is home to excellent restaurants offering delicious gastronomic experiences. Guests recharge in the 1,000 m2 wellness center, Hespérides Thalasso spa with a state-of-the-arts thermal circuit and 12 treatment cabins. Yambaland kid´s club offers hours of fun for children with plenty of creative activities. The rest of the leisure facilities include: 4 swimming pools, a fitness center, a tennis court, a mini golf, access to the beach and access to the close by Fuerteventura Golf Club. The selection of meeting rooms with natural sunlight are ideal for hosting any type of social events or meetings.Marriott

name: Aparthotel la Piramide
address: Berlina, 7, 35610 Caleta de Fuste, Fuerteventura
description: Aparthotel la Piramide is a 10-minute drive from Fuerteventura Airport and 3 km from Castillo Beach. It features an outdoor pool, hot tub and sauna, as well as a gym and tennis court. All apartments have a balcony with pool views. There is a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV. You can hire the safe, and there is a private bathroom. The kitchenette includes a fridge, hob and coffee maker. The complex has a café, restaurant and poolside bar. Packed lunches can be requested and there are vending machines for snacks. Free parking is available nearby and an airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge. Fuerteventura Golf Club is 5 km away.

name: Salobre Hotel Resort & Serenity
address: Calle Swing, Salobre Golf Resort, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Set within the 18-hole Salobre Golf Course, Salobre Hotel Resort & Serenity features 7 outdoor swimming pools and a spa. This hotel is 15 minutes' drive from Maspalomas. Guest rooms at the resort are equipped with a terrace with mountain views as well as a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a bath. A safe is available at no extra charge. Salobre Hotel Resort & Serenity features 3 restaurants offering a wide range of international and local dishes. Guests can also have a drink in one of the 3 bars available. The wellness centre offers a variety of facial and body treatments. Guests can also join the on-site gym or sports activities such as yoga, basketball or cycling. The property offers a free shuttle to Meloneras Beach. Playa del Ingles is 7 km from Salobre Hotel Resort & Serenity, while Playa de las Burras is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 31 km from the property. Please note that both the Sunset Pool and the Spa Centre are adults only. Please note beach transfer is possible every hour from 11:00 to 18:00, subject to availability. Please note that the Gala dinner on the 31st December is included for all rates. Half board dinners are buffet-style. All guests will need to provide a valid ID, including children. Please note that guests must present the credit card used to make the reservation on arrival. Since 17th October 2022, The New and The Old Course merged to feature three different loops by combining the Old Course’s 18 holes and holes 1 to 3 and 13 to 18 of par 36 New Course that will defy you to enjoy the challenges of a course with unparalleled personality.

name: Tivoli la Caleta Resort
address: C/la Enramada 9, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Immerse yourself in luxury at Tivoli La Caleta Tenerife Resort, the first Tivoli property to open in Spain. A fully renewed property, the hotel benefits from an astonishing seafront setting in Tenerife’s exclusive Costa Adeje resort. The hotel itself has a distinctive southern Moroccan style that includes sensual lines and soft edges. Inside, guests will find 284 guest rooms and suites that have been designed as inviting spaces. During their stay, guests will enjoy use of a luxurious collection of leisure facilities, including three swimming pools, a 24-hour gym, a spa, paddle/tennis courts and a terrace with gardens. A dining destination in itself, Tivoli La Caleta Tenerife Resort provides guests with a fantastic selection of food and beverage options, including four restaurants and five bars. From the signature Tivoli Breakfast Buffet to the widest cocktail offering in the area and the three restaurants signed by Olivier, guests will find an option that suits their cravings at any time of day.NH Hoteles

name: Catalonia Oro Negro
address: Arq. Gómez Cuesta 14, 38660 Arona, Tenerife
description: Catalonia Oro Negro is less than 10 minutes’ walk from Playa de las Américas Beach in southern Tenerife. The hotel features free WiFi, a large outdoor swimming pool and rooms with satellite TV. All rooms are bright and simply decorated with air conditioning. They have either a private balcony or terrace, some of which have sea views. Premium rooms have access to a rooftop pool, available only for guests over 18. Hotel Catalonia Oro Negro offers a buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner in the hotel restaurant. There are 2 bars, including the Show Bar which provides evening entertainment. A modern gym is also available at the Oro Negro. Daytime activities include aerobics, table tennis and volley ball. The hotel has a terrace with loungers, a garden and children’s playground. The Alegria onsite spa features massage services. Catalonia Oro Negro is located less than 1 km from the centre of Playa de las Américas and 20 km from Tenerife Sur Airport.

name: Catalonia Las Vegas
address: Avenida Colón, 2, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: This lovely hotel is perfectly placed in front of the Martiánez Lakes, boasting stunning views of Teide mountain. It offers free WiFi throughout. Located in the centre of Puerto de la Cruz, there is a taxi rank opposite the hotel. A bus from the nearby stop will take you to any corner of the island. Whatever the purpose of your stay, this hotel has all kinds of modern facilities to cater for your needs.

name: Gran Melia Palacio de Isora
address: Avenida Los Océanos, s/n, Alcalá, 38686 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: With its privileged Oceanfront location, this spectacular Design Hotel offers stunning views of the island La Gomera and Mount Teide. It is perfectly integrated in the South west coast of Tenerife, in the fishing village Alcala, Guia de Isora. The resort is at five minutes car distance from the beautiful Los Gigantes cliffs, while offering an inspiring proposal to live magic moments and new sensations. Highlights are the impressive colonial Plaza with fountains and chill-out corners and the huge sea water lagoon infinity pool. In addition various fresh water pools, including a pool only for adults, a family pool and a separate childrens pool, as well as the exclusive RedLevel pool. 6 Restaurants, 6 Bars, Yhi Spa with thermal circuit and Yhi Moves, a 24 hours fitness centre. The resort also offers a programme of life enriching activities, professional animation, tennis and paddle courts, archery, miniclub and subtropical gardens. The glorious room facilities are all very spacious with beautiful garden and ocean views and a minimum of 48sqm with private terrace of balcony. The exclusive RedLevel Demi Suites and Oceanfront Garden Villas offer an even superior level of luxury and personalised service, for adults only.priceline.com

name: Aparthotel los Dragos del Sur
address: Avenida Maritima Puerto De Santiago, 38683 Puerto de Santiago, Tenerife
description: This aparthotel offers Atlantic Ocean views from its position above Tenerife’s Playa de la Arena. With an outdoor pool, it is a 5-minute drive from Los Gigantes Harbour and Cliffs. Los Dragos del Sur apartments have private terrace, all with ocean or swimming pool views. Each air-conditioned apartment has a private bathroom and satellite TV. The kitchen comes with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Aparthotel Los Dragos del Sur includes a gym available free of charge. Breakfast is served at the hotel's restaurant, and there is a poolside snack bar and a chill out area. Free WiFi is available throughout. Water sports are available on the beach, and Abama Golf Course is 10 km away. You can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk and rent beach towels or a safe. There is a 24-hour front desk. Tenerife South Airport is 41 km away.

name: Alua Atlantico Golf
address: Avenida Del Atlántico, 3, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in San Miguel de Abona. Boasting a kids' club, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, indoor pool, karaoke and a 24-hour front desk. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bath and a desk. At the hotel the rooms are equipped with a wardrobe and a private bathroom. The establishment also offers My Favourite Club®, with exclusive services and special attributes in room categories. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive The accommodation offers a terrace. You can play table tennis, and tennis at Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive, and car hire is available. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Playa San Miguel de Abona, Playa El Barranco and Playa de San Blas. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur, 10 km from Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Abama
address: Carretera General, TF-47, km 9, 38687 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: The Ritz-Carlton Tenerife, Abama is an oasis of tranquility and seclusion, where sea, land and subtropical vegetation effortlessly collide with Moorish-inspired architecture. The 459 guest rooms & suites - divided between the Citadel and four exclusive rows of villas - enjoy magnificent views over the Atlantic Ocean, Mount Teide or our lush gardens. The resort offers a collection of restaurants ranging from light, simple cooking to world-class gourmet cuisine. At the top end of the scale, our Michelin-starred restaurants - M.B awarded with two stars and Kabuki with one. Providing a heaven of escape, this timeless island retreat features 7 swimming pools, a 2500m2 Spa & Fitness Center and the largest Ritz Kids in Europe. Guests can enjoy an 18-hole championship golf course designed by Ryder Cup player Dave Thomas, the Abama Tennis Academy, and an exclusive area on the Abama beach with complimentary use of sunbeds and umbrellas, serviced by our Ladies & Gentlemen.Marriott

name: Alua Tenerife
address: C. Antonio Ruiz Alvarez 7, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Alua Tenerife is 300 metres from Playa Jardín and 10 minutes’ walk from Puerto de la Cruz. It has 2 outdoor pools a children and an adult one, a buffet restaurant and a free pitch and putt golf course. Guests have access to an indoor pool, sauna and hot tub for an extra charge. Facilities also include gym, tennis and squash courts. The establishment offers My Favorite Club®, with exclusive services such as: - personalized check-in and check-out, access to My Favorite Club Lounge with snacks and drinks, - access to exclusive areas - and welcome bottle of sparkling wine and a letter from the General Manager at check-in. Each room comes with a fridge, balcony or terrace and satellite TV. A safe, cot or extra bed are available on request. Air conditioning is available during certain hours of the day throughout the summer months. Free WiFi is available in rooms. There is a small on-site shopping centre including a supermarket. There is a children’s play area and a games room. There is a bus station 15 minutes’ walk away in Puerto de la Cruz offering services to other parts of the island.

name: Hotel Rural Finca La Hacienda
address: Nuestra Senora De Lourdes, 2, 38470 Los Silos, Tenerife
description: Hotel Rural Finca La Hacienda offers rustic apartments, 13 km from Icod de los Vinos, Tenerife. Set in gardens with sun terraces and barbecue facilities, all apartments offer mountain views. Apartments feature wooden floors and heating. The living room has a satellite TV and sofa or sofa bed. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. The kitchenette includes a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Breakfast is available in the buffet restaurant and there is a bar. Packed lunches can also be requested. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are offered. There is a tour desk, where you can hire a car or bicycle, and an airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge. A wide range of hiking trails can be found very nearby.

name: Catalonia Punta Del Rey
address: Avda. Marítima, 165, Candelaria, Tenerife
description: This hotel is conveniently located next to the beach and close to the marina. The airport is conveniently close since it is just about 20 minutes’ drive away. There are shops, bars and restaurants nearby, and public transportation links in the immediate vicinity. Attractions close to the hotel include the Fine Arts Museum, San Cristobal de La Laguna Cathedral, and the Canary Islands Regional Military Museum. Guests will enjoy spending the day in the outdoor pool area sunbathing, under the shadow of an umbrella or having a refreshing swim. The property offer delicious meals along with an agreeable atmosphere. The rooms are decorated with a combination of light and warm colours and are equipped with all the needed amenities needed for a comfortable stay.FarePortal

name: Checkin Bungalows Atlantida
address: Avenida Londres, 3, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: With fantastic facilities, Checkin Bungalows Atlántida are perfect for combining independence and a fun-filled holiday in the Tenerife sunshine with all the family. Make the most of the sports facilities and the 3 swimming pools, 2 of which are heated during winter season. Checkin Bungalows Atlántida has outstanding possibilities for keeping active during your holiday. Gather a group of friends for a game of tennis or squash. Soak up the sunshine beside the pool and then play mini golf or basketball in the fresh air. Relax with a refreshment in the restaurant or bar with large sun terrace. Checkin Bungalows Atlántida is situated in the fishing and sailing village of Cristianos, near Tenerife's wonderful beaches and views of the Atlantic Ocean.

name: Bahia Principe Sunlight Tenerife
address: Idafe Urb Playa Paraiso, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Featuring outdoor pools, sun terraces and on-site restaurants, Bahia Principe Tenerife is set on the Costa Adeje coast, 10 minutes’ drive from Adeje town and Costa Adeje Golf Club. The property includes an on-site gym, tennis courts, spa and children’s playground. You will also find entertainment options such as karaoke. Air-conditioned rooms come with a private balcony and TV. They each have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Playa de las Americas is a 20-minute drive away, and there you will find a range of shops and dining options. Tenerife Sur Airport can also be reached in 20 minutes’ drive.

name: The Villas at Bahia del Duque
address: Avenida de Bruselas, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: With pool views, The Villas at Bahia del Duque is set in Adeje and has a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, bar, garden, sun terrace and children's playground. Both WiFi and private parking are available at the villa free of charge. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with bathrobes, bidet, bath and shower. A microwave, a fridge and minibar are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A continental breakfast is available every morning at The Villas at Bahia del Duque. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a spa facilities, wellness packages and beauty services. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at The Villas at Bahia del Duque, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near the villa include El Duque Beach, Enramada Beach and Playa de Fanabe. The nearest airport is Tenerife South, 21 km from The Villas at Bahia del Duque, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bahia Del Duque
address: Avenida Bruselas, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Overlooking Duque Beach in Tenerife, the luxurious Bahia Del Duque is surrounded by 6 hectares of subtropical gardens. It offers 5 outdoor pools, fitness centre and stylish accommodation with private balcony. At Gran Hotel Bahia del Duque Resort you can choose between modern rooms and chic villas. All accommodation comes with LCD satellite TV and a bathrobe and slippers. The Gran Bahia del Duque complex offers 8 restaurants, including Italian and Oriental options. There are also 7 bars, including a juice bar and a beach bar. The hotel offers a huge variety of leisure activities, including aerobics classes and whale watching. There are tennis courts, a table tennis table and a botanical walking route. Adeje Golf Course and Siam Water Park are around 5 minutes’ drive from the Bahía Duque. You can drive to Tenerife Sur Airport in around 15 minutes.

name: NH Valencia Las Artes
address: Avenida Instituto Obrero, 28, 46013 Valencia, Valencia
description: The NH Valencia Las Artes hotel is ideally situated close to the Joaquín Sorolla Station and is a 13km bus or car ride from Valencia Airport. It is conveniently located near several attractions including the City of Arts and Sciences, the aquarium and an IMAX cinema. The Palau de les Arts Reina Sofia, the Valencia Cathedral, and Malvarrosa Beach are also all within a 1km to 7km distance and are easily accessible by foot or bus. Both the Central Market and the El Saler Centro Comercial shopping centers are also close by. Each of our 174 comfortable guest rooms have contemporary amenities including room service, free Wi-Fi, and comfortable mattresses. The junior suite has a coffee and tea maker, a sitting area, and sofa for guests who require additional space, not to mention the fantastic view of the opera house. A breakfast buffet is available daily and made-to-order hot dishes are cooked upon request. The elegant NH Valencia Las Artes Restaurant opens for lunch and dinner with its cuisine focused on local Mediterranean fare. A gym with a sauna, a children’s play area, a year-round heated swimming pool, wake up service, and three terraces are additional features for our guests enjoy.NH Hoteles

name: Parador de El Saler
address: Avda. De Los Pinares, 151, 46012 El Saler, Valencia
description: This Parador is located on the famous El Saler golf course, within a coastal nature reserve. Luxurious and contemporary, it has a spa and free Wi-Fi. The rooms of the Parador Campo de Golf El Saler are modern and spacious. All have heating, air conditioning and TV. Many of them have views of the golf course. In the spa you will find a range of exclusive treatments and massages. It also has saunas and a heated swimming pool. During the summer the hotel has an outdoor swimming pool. The Parador has free parking. The restaurant of the El Saler specialises in local rice dishes, above all paella. The El Saler golf course is ranked in the top 10 in Spain. Alternatively, you can explore the Albufera Nature Reserve which is home to a wide range of plant and wildlife. The city of Valencia is just 18 km away.

name: Bungalows Park Albufera
address: Carrera Del Riu 556, 46012 El Saler, Valencia
description: A short distance from bicycle rentals, the sea, and more, this beach mobile home lets you experience it all. Albufera Natural Park is just steps away and Platja del Saler is within an easy 8-minute walk, so leave your car at the property, which offers onsite parking. Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the seasonal outdoor pool, or sip a drink in the garden of this mobile home, which also features a picnic area. For a change of scenery, come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and TV. As you settle into this 3-bedroom rental, you'll find a living room, premium bedding, a BBQ grill, and air conditioning. The kitchen is equipped with a refrigerator, a microwave, and cookware. And you can even travel light because you'll have access to laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Hotel Maya Alicante
address: Canónigo Manuel Penalva, 2, 03002 Alicante, Valencia
description: Set at the foot of Santa Barbara Castle, Hotel Maya is 5 minutes’ walk from Alicante Beach and 10 minutes’ walk from the centre. It has a seasonal outdoor pool, free WiFi and a gym with panoramic views. All air-conditioned rooms at the Maya have satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer. The Maya has easy access to Postiguet Beach, which is 5 minutes' walk from the hotel. The hotel provides an entertainment programme for adults and children during July and August. The restaurant serves local and international dishes, as well as rice specialities. There is also a café. Room service and packed lunches are available and there are vending machines selling drinks and snacks The Plaza Mar 2 Shopping Centre is 100 metres away. The train to Terra Mítica Theme Park and Benidorm stops opposite the Maya. The C6 airport bus stop is just 50 metres from the hotel.

name: Amor de Helene
address: Tomas Elis Yusti,4, 03540 Alicante, Valencia
description: Situated in Alicante, less than 1 km from San Juan Beach, Amor de Helene features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. Boasting a bar, the hostel is close to several noted attractions, around 1.3 km from Cantalars Cove and around 1.5 km from Cantalars Cove. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and room service. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also feature free WiFi, while some rooms also boast pool view. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Amor de Helene. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Guests at Amor de Helene will be able to enjoy activities in and around Alicante, like hiking. Alicante Golf is 2.3 km from the hostel, while Alicante Train Station is 8.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Alicante–Elche Miguel Hernández, 26 km from Amor de Helene, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Barceló Montecastillo Golf
address: Carretera de Arcos km 6, 11406 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Completely renovated in March 2013 the Barcelo Montecastillo Golf is a true icon of the Jerez area thanks to its high quality facilities and its characteristic elegant and simple design.The hotel is perfect for guests looking for relaxation and tranquillity on their holidays offered by the hotels complete Spa for golf lovers for companies who wish to hold meetings at the hotel or for tourists who want to discover Jerezs bodegas and equestrian events. This hotel has a total of 162 rooms and a group of villas making it the perfect accommodation for families and groups of friends who want to enjoy a tranquil and relaxing holiday.This resort offer you 3 outdoor swimming pools Wellbeing Club Spa Circuit dry sauna steam sauna and gym. 4 Treatment rooms. Lounges 16 Halls for Events Exhibition gallery Rooms for private banquets Golf course 18 hole golf course designed by Jack Nicklaus. It was the venue for the Volvo Masters for 5 years in a row 1997/2001 Practice course and Putting Green Golf Academy Exclusive use of Private Academy for groups or events. Football and other sports 2 international regulation size football grounds Dressing rooms at the football grounds Jogging track Multisport athletics track Tennis court Barcelo Hotels and Resorts offers you in this hotel the original and new gastronomic concept of Healthy Gourmet which consists in the mixture of great quality products exquisite flavours sublime presentations.The perfect combination between eating well and in a healthy way.Barcelo.com

name: Pedra Iberica
address: Rua De Dom João Iv, 960, 4000-300 Porto, Porto
description: This brightly decorated guest house offers panoramic views from its hillside location overlooking Porto. Set in a historic building, Pedra Iberica provides classical-styled rooms with flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. All of the individually decorated rooms feature ornate furnishings and views of the garden from your own private patio. Each room includes an en-suite bathroom with free toiletries. Pedra Iberica’s central location provides many restaurants within a 5-minute walk.Communal outdoor barbecue facilities are available for guest's usage. Guests can relax in the guest house’s lush garden and comfortable terrace. The property has a small children's park area. São Bento Train Station and Marquês Metro Station are both a 5-minute drive away. Francisco de Sá Carneiro Airport is 15 km away by car.

name: Pestana Carlton Madeira
address: Largo António Nobre, nº 1, 9004-531 Funchal, Madeira
description: Offering 4 restaurants, 2 bars and Atlantic Ocean views, the 5-star Pestana Carlton Madeira Ocean Resort Hotel is situated on a cliff top on Madeira Island. Funchal’s centre is 10 minutes' walk away. Pestana Carlton Madeira's leisure offer includes a giant chess board, a certified, on-site diving school and a tennis court. All suites and rooms feature elegant décor, flat-screen TVs and balconies with sea, mountain or pool views. One of the 2 saltwater pools has stairs leading to the sea. For relaxation, Pestana's Venus Health Spa includes an indoor heated pool, Scottish shower and massage treatments. Guests can choose from the rustic atmosphere of the hotel's Taverna Grill or by the cool pool and gardenside setting of the Garden Pool Restaurante & Bar. Activities such as paragliding, yacht excursions and windsurfing are available nearby. The Pestana Carlton Madeira Ocean Resort Hotel is a 20-minute drive from Madeira's International Airport. Private parking is available, at an extra fee.

name: Reid's Palace, A Belmond Hotel, Madeira
address: Estrada Monumental 139, 9000-098 Funchal, Madeira
description: Set on a cliff in 10 acres of subtropical gardens overlooking the Atlantic, this 5-star resort features an oceanfront spa, 3 swimming pools and direct access to oceanic waters. All rooms at Reid's Palace are elegantly furnished and include a balcony and marble bathroom with amenities. A minibar with complimentary soft drinks and free in-room movies are available to each room. Reid’s Palace Spa features indoor and outdoor therapy suites with a private whirlpool. It offers an indulgent menu of treatments using world-class spa brands. Dry and wet saunas are also on site. Active guests can play a match on the tennis courts, or get energised with cardiovascular equipment at the modern gym. Madeira's finest ingredients are brought to life at Michelin-starred William Restaurant, while the Villa Cipriani serves classic Italian dishes. The Dining Room organises elegant soirees in Edwardian ambiance, during the winter season. The Reid’s is 3 km from Praia Formosa Beach and 15 minutes’ walk to Funchal city centre with plenty of nightlife. It provides free private parking.

name: Quinta Santo Antonio Da Serra
address: Estrada Santo Antonio Da Serra, 477, 9100-255 Santa Cruz, Madeira
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a soaking tub and nearby pool access, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Madeira Sunset Cottage - Nature Retreat
description: Madeira Sunset Cottage - Nature Retreat offers chalet accommodation with an outdoor heated swimming pool with water jets, a green garden, an organic orchard and barbecue facilities. This property is 550 metres above sea level and is composed of five Nordic-style cottages. Each unit features a private bathroom with free toiletries, an equipped kitchenette, free WiFi, streaming services and scenic views over the valley and ocean. Guests are welcome to prepare their own meals in the self-catering chalets. The units feature equipped kitchenettes, with all the utensils needed to prepare meals. On request, it is possible to create special welcome baskets tailored to the guest's preferences. Breakfast is delivered in the cottage every day and guests are welcome to prepare their own meals in the self-catering chalets. The pool and surrounding area are ideal for lounging after a refreshing swim, while the garden is great for strolling and relaxing in the hammocks. Massages are available, at a surcharge and guests can rent a car through the front desk staff. Around the property there are a vast of green areas and several hiking trails. Porto Moniz is a 17-minute drive and RabaÃ§al area and the 25 fountains trail are only 35 minutes - drive away. Madeira Sunset Cottage - Nature Retreat is a 1-hour drive from the Funchal Ecological Park and the Madeira Airport.

name: Novotel Lisboa
address: Avenida Jose Malhoa 1 1A, 1099-051 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in central Lisbon, with easy access to transport, the Novotel hotel is convenient for family vacations or business trips. It is located 500 yards from Lisbon Zoo, near the Gulbenkian Foundation. The restaurant and bar are perfect for relaxing and socializing. After a gym workout, why not head to the outdoor pool if the weather is nice? There are also 10 meeting rooms with plenty of natural light.accorhotels.com

name: TRYP by Wyndham Lisboa Caparica Mar
address: Avenida General Humberto, 2829-506 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: TRYP by Wyndham is a select-service upper-midscale hotel brand with over 100 locations tucked in the heart of some of the most dynamic and cosmopolitan cities in Europe and the Americas. TRYP hotels cater to both business and leisure travelers who value quality of life with professional excellence, by offering several specialty guest rooms, including Family Rooms with bunk beds and Fitness Rooms with exercise equipment. TRYP offers a unique experience that encourages guests to enjoy the city, socialize and live life to the fullest.Wyndham

name: Convento do Espinheiro, Historic Hotel & Spa
address: Canaviais, 7005-839 Evora, Evora
description: Surrounded by 80 000m² of beautiful gardens, this 5-star hotel is 4 km from Évora city centre and housed in a renovated 15th-century convent. It offers a piano bar and free parking. Guest rooms at Convento do Espinheiro are luxuriously furnished, free wifi and coffee machine. Each en suite bathroom offers a bathrobe, slippers and free bathroom amenities. Some rooms have a private terrace. Massage treatments are available at Convento do Espinheiro’s spa. Leisure facilities include a tennis court, indoor and outdoor pools and a well-equipped fitness centre. Guests can enjoy cocktails at Convento do Espinheiro Historic Hotel & Spa poolside bar. Restaurant Divinus serves a mix of Mediterranean and Portuguese cuisine. A complimentary wine tasting is available everyday, in the late afternoon. Évora city centre is a 10-minute drive from this luxurious hotel.

name: Penha Longa Resort
address: Estrada da Lagoa Azul, Linho, 2714-511 Sintra, Lisbon District
description: Breaking the lush landscape of Sintra’s rolling green hills Penha Longa Resort is a reminder that true beauty withstands time. The hotel, the only within the natural park, seamlessly incorporates a 14th century monastery and chapel within its luxurious setting. A 27-hole championship golf course is to be both played and admired family-focused activities celebrate nature and tradition; and three of nine dining experiences hold coveted Michelin stars.Marriott

name: Royal Obidos Spa & Golf Resort
address: Cabeço Da Serra 0, Óbidos, Leiria
description: Overlooking the Atlantic Ocean, the design Royal Obidos Spa & Golf Resort features an outdoor pool with sun loungers. Guests can relax in the Spa, offering a varied range of treatments and massages. The property comprises an 18-hole golf course and the clubhouse offers a restaurant, 2 bars and bag storage area. With free WiFi access, the spacious and natural-light rooms come with a satellite LCD TV and air conditioning. The typical Portuguese-tile bathroom is equipped with bathrobes and a bath tub. All rooms were decorated by a design studio. Guests will also a find a fitness centre. The unit has views over golf course, Atlantic Ocean and the Óbidos Lagoon. Lisbon's Portela Airport is 1-hour driving distance from Royal Obidos Spa & Golf Resort. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Pinhalmar
address: Estrada Marginal Sul 1, 2520-227 Peniche, Leiria
description: WOT Peniche PinhalMar offers an outdoor pool, a terrace and a restaurant overlooking the ocean. It is located only 1 km from Peniche town centre. Pinhalmar offers comfortable rooms fitted with air conditioning and sunken ceiling lights. Each one has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. Free parking and Wi-Fi are available. The hotel also offers bicycle rental. Cocktails, beverages and light snacks are available the bar. Its terrace overlooks the ocean and boasts sunset views. Pinhalmar Hotel is also 1.5 km away from Peniche Harbour.

name: Bom Sucesso Resort
address: Lugar DO Bom Sucesso - Vau 27, 2510-665 Óbidos, Leiria
description: Located next to Óbidos Lagoon, this 5-star resort offers uniquely designed villas, just a 15-minute drive from the medieval town of Óbidos. It features an outdoor pool, and an 18-hole golf course. Designed by famous architects, all villas and houses of Bom Sucesso have a private furnished patio that leads to the garden.
