All elegant and sophisticated accommodation features a kitchen and common areas decorated in a contemporary style. Daily cleaning is included. The Guardian Bom Sucesso Golf, a golf course with a PGA rating, occupies an area exceeding 60 hectares and has 18 holes, a driving range and a golf academy. Bom Sucesso Holiday Design Villas offers 4 tennis courts, 2 paddle tennis courts, football pitch and a kids club. Bom Sucesso’s restaurant and bars offer international cuisine and Mediterranean dishes with a Portuguese touch. Breakfast is served at the golf club house. During the summer, a shuttle to transport guests to the beach and Óbidos is available. The property is a 60-minute drive from Lisbon International Airport.

name: Novotel Setubal
address: Monte Belo, En 10, 2910-509 Setúbal, Setubal
description: "A paradise about 30 minutes from Lisbon". Disconnect from the world and discover Novotel Setubal - a lost pearl in the Atlantic! Enjoy the dolphins at the Sado Estuary nature reserve or venture into the Arrábida Mountains. White sandy beaches and crystal clear waters are nearby. The hotel has an authentic mountain and beach setting for your well-being and enjoyable stay.accorhotels.com

name: Ohai Nazaré Outdoor Resort
address: Estrada Nacional 242, Nazaré, Leiria
description: Located in the countryside, 3 km away from Nazaré beach and 4 km from Praia do Norte beach, Ohai Nazaré Outdoor Resort offers chalets and apartments set among wild pine trees and features a heated outdoor pool, an aquatic park and a hot tub. Guests can choose between small charming bungalows surrounded by nature, apartments or glamping in family units. All accommodations include a well-equipped kitchen. The on-site restaurant offers a varied menu with local and international cuisine. Ohai Nazaré Outdoor Resort offers a kids club and a playroom, where guests can play billiards and video games. There is also a gym and a padel and volleyball court. Free WiFi is available throughout. In summer, the night entertainment ranges from karaoke to live music. The property is about an hour’s drive from Lisbon, and offers free private car and motorcycle parking on site.

name: Malibu Foz Hotel - La Maison Younan
address: Rua Dos Lusiadas, 3080-096 Figueira da Foz, Coimbra
description: Just 2 km from Serra da Boa Viagem Mountain, Malibu Foz Hotel offers a large pool in a residential area of Figueira Da Foz. The city centre is a 15-minute walk away. The rooms and suites of Malibu Foz Hotel have a modern décor and include views of the surrounding area. Each comes with air conditioning and a balcony. Guests can enjoy a variety of facilities that include a cinema room, a kids' club and a fitness centre. The surrounding area is ideal for hiking, cycling, diving, or fishing activities. The Mensa Restaurant features panoramic views of the swimming pool and serves Italian cuisine. There is a pool bar serving lunch and drinks. The nearest beach is 300 metres away.

name: Tivoli Carvoeiro
address: Apartado 1299, Vale Do Covo, 8401-911 Praia do Carvoeiro, Faro
description: Tucked into a cliffside overlooking the glistening Atlantic Ocean, the five-star Tivoli Carvoeiro Hotel is a jewel in the Algarve’s crown. This luxury resort is a 10-minute walk from the beach, and you can explore more of this stunning stretch of coastline on the Seven Hanging Valleys Trail. The hotel has 248 spacious rooms on six floors, with most offering a balcony or terrace. Decorated in elegant blues and whites to represent the sea, the rooms are equipped with Nespresso machines, flat-screen TVs and video on demand. Our Carvoeiro Suite even has a standalone tub that looks out over the ocean. You’ll be spoilt for choice by our bars and restaurants. Breakfast is an American-style buffet with pastries, local hams and cheeses, and hot options. Experience fine wines and authentic Portuguese cuisine in our three restaurants, with freshly caught seafood a menu highlight. To drink in the best views, head to our rooftop bars for a cool mojito or craft beer. Whether you want to pamper yourself with an organic seaweed treatment in the spa, invigorate yourself in the pool, dive beneath the ocean or organize a game of golf, the hotel’s incredible facilities and staff will make your stay a memorable one.NH Hoteles

name: Penina Hotel & Golf Resort
address: Estrada Nacional 125, 8501-952 Portimão, Faro
description: Set within expansive, lush gardens, this 5-star resort in the Algarve is 5 km from Portimão and the city of Lagos. Penina Hotel & Golf Resort features a selection of sports and leisure facilities, including 3 golf courses and a large outdoor swimming pool. The rooms at Penina Hotel & Golf Resort are filled with natural light and have plush beds with white linens. Some open onto balconies and feature seating areas. Many overlook the pool area. Leisure amenities include massage treatments, a sauna, a well-equipped fitness centre, 5 on site tennis courts. For younger guests, Penina Hotel & Golf Resort features a Children's Club, which offers weekly programmes with a selection of leisure and sporting activities. There are 5 restaurants available, which serve a range of Portuguese, Italian and international cuisine. Children’s menus and themed evenings are offered. The 4 on site bars provide light snacks and cocktails. Free parking is offered at the hotel. Alvor Beach and Continente Shopping Centre are both a 5-minute drive away from the Penina Hotel & Golf Resort.
